page.title: 12FAMILY LIVES
page.content: {FAMILY LIVES. {1.BETHAN JONES.(ON A SATURDAY) IN THE MORNING ALL THE FAMILY GETS UP AT 8.30.WE ALL GO DOWN STAIRS AND HAVE BREAKFAST.AT 10.30 MY DAD & I GO SHOPPING IN ST.ASAPH WHILST MY MUM MAKES DINNER.IN THE AFTERNOON MY DAD GOES TO PLAY GOLF & THE REST OF THE FAMILY GOES SHOPPING IN THE NEW PRECINCT IN RHYL.WHEN MY DAD RETURNS WE HAVE A MEAL,AFTER WHICH WE GO FOR A DRIVE AROUND THE LOCAL AREA. {2.NEIL ROBERTS.(ON A SCHOOL DAY) I GET UP AT 7.30a.m.AND CHANGE INTO MY CLOTHES.I GET MY BREAKFAST,USUALLY A CEREAL,AND GET MY LUNCH READY.I WALK TO SCHOOL AND ARRIVE AT ABOUT 8.45.THE SCHOOL DAY STARTS AT 9.00.WHEN I GET HOME FROM SCHOOL I EITHER STAY OUTSIDE & PLAY ON MY BIKE OR I GO TO MY BEDROOM & WATCH THE T.V.,READ OR PLAY WITH MY GAMES.
